description:
The studio is located in an amazing and super quite neighborhood, just 4 minutes walking distance from bus stops, the 1 train and Metro North (it will take you to the city in just 20 minutes), also there's a lot of commercial places like Target, Marshall, TJ Max, Aldi, etc, food places like: Applebee's, Parrilla Latina, Tabaco y Ron, El Malecón, Etc, 3 different gyms, also Van Cortland Park is just 10 minutes away

Is pretty comfortable and it was just renovated

Everything in the apartament

Pretty often

Everything you need is in there from little stores to Target

Yes, everything is 4 minutes walking distance.
Bus stop
1 Train
Metro North

NO SMOKING!
name: Amazing Renovated Studio
review: el apto. estuvo bien en cuanto a limpieza y la zona muy bien , ahora bien , hay que asegurarse de los servicios de cable e internec, wifi ademas si tomas cafe y quieres hacerlo antes de salir a la klle, verificar que haya greca
